post_title: FS (Prices cut) - Two tough to find graded off backs, Lumley and Chase Dark Cap.
post_content:
For Sale (prices cut) - Two difficult to find graded off backs, prices include shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note:  NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover NC ST.

T206 Harry Lumley EPDG - PSA 3  $320 venmo or zelle, $330 if you prefer pp gs.

T206 Hal Chase Throwing, Dark Cap Tolstoi (low pop.) - SGC 2  $375 venmo or Zelle, $390 if you prefer pp gs.
